info.title: TD/OMS Transfer Objects API
info.description: This API is used to transfer the objects.

port.description: The port to which the server is listening

selectRequestForOneorMoreObjects.summary: How to specify select input parameter values for one or more objects in the environment of a task

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.
Authorization information is missing or invalid.

409.description: Conflict in pre transfer check file OMPTT

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.
Authorization information is missing or invalid.
Authorization information is missing or invalid.

endOfProcessing.description: Closes the underlying API after calling. Keep open with '0' if you have to call the API in quick succession. Make sure to close on the last call with '1'

updateDb.description: Specify '1' to update the database or '0' to not update but check only.

updateBuffer.description: Specify '1' to update the returned data with the latest values or '0' to not return the latest task data.

extendedMessage.description: It contains all the error messages returned by the API.

status.description:
This status will return following values based on validations.    
*NORM - If object can be processed without any error or warning.     
*CONF- If object has encountered some warning.     
*TERM - If object cannot be processed.

messageTextExtended.description: It contains the additional message information based on the value of the request.

fixedNumberofSubEnvironments.description: If > 0 then this number of sub-environments must be selected. If 0 then the user may decide how many sub-environments are selected. If -1 then there is no selection required on sub-environments.

status.description:
You can use the Status option to disable    
this target or to mark it as a branching    
template.                                   
                                            
0=Active                                    
    The sub-environment is used normaly when
    transfering objects.                    

 1=Disabled                              
     The sub-environment is not used when
     transfering objects.                
                                         
 2=Template                              
     The sub-environment is a branching  
     template.

jobDescriptionCode.description: It contains the job description code.

description.description: Description contains an explanation of the job description.

jobDescriptionLibrary.description: It contains the job description library.

queuePriority.description:
The Queue priority indicator indicates the priority of the job to be submitted using 
this job description.    
                 
0 = *NORMAL - The job priority will be normal.     
1 = *HIGH - The job priority will be high.

defaultJobDesc.description:
The Default indicator is used to make the default job description.

0 = No   - The job description is not the default.
1 = Yes -  The job description will be the default.

objectList.description:
List of Objects for select.
If all objects in the task need to be selected, the Object List should be left blank.
If only some of the objects in the task need to be selected, the Object Code and its Type should be listed in the Object List.

schedules.description: It contains the transfer schedule information.

addressDetails.description: It contains the address and job description details.

jobDescriptions.description: It contains the job description informations.

scheduleDate.description: The schedule date is used in an Object Transfer function to enter the date the Object Transfer job has to be scheduled for. The date must be entered in user format.

scheduleTime.description: The schedule time is used in an Object Transfer function to enter the time the Object Transfer job has to be scheduled for.

jobDescriptionCode.description: It will include the job description code.

jobDescription.description: It will include the job description.

jobDescriptionLibrary.description: It will include the job description library.

holdJob.description: Indicate whether the job must be held for managed deployments.

schedule.description: It will contain the transfer schedule information.

isJobRunning.description: Return true if the job is currently active; otherwise, return false.

objects.description: How many objects are in the transfer.

objectsProcessed.description: Return How many objects are processed.

deployed.description: Return the number of machines distributed.

inProgress.description: Return the number of  deployments are inprogress.

failed.description: Return the number of deployements are failed..

success.description: Return the number deployements are success.

deployment.description: Return the distribution details like how many machines are distributed, how many machines are success/in progress/fail

value.messageText: Unauthorized or expired token. Please login again.

select.summary: How to specify the select request input parameters value at task level.

selectRequestObjectLevel.summary: How to specify the select request input parameters value for object.

selectRequestIFSLevel.summary: How to specify the select request input parameters value for ifs object.

selectRequestCopyBookLevel.summary: How to specify the select request input parameters value for copybook member.

selectRequestForActionTransfer.summary: How to specify the select request input parameters for action Transfer.

selectRequestForActionCopy.summary: How to specify the select request input parameters for action Copy.

selectRequestForActionMove.summary: How to specify the select request input parameters for action Move.

selectResponse200.summary: Response to a successful API call.

selectResponseTransfer200.summary: Response for action Transfer to a successful API call

reason.messageText: Objects from Fix XT0497 not allowed to be transferred to the next environment.
reason.messageTextExtended: &N Cause . . . . . :   Some objects of Fix XT0497 of Application XMP have currently a status lower as the ratification level. The objects from environment *ACC can not leave for environment *PRD until all objects have passed the ratification level of environment *ACC after the fix has been ratified by authorized staff. &N Recovery  . . . :   Do as indicated and try your request again.

selectResponseCopy200.summary: Response for action Copy to a successful API call.

selectResponseMove200.summary: Response for action Move to a successful API call.

reason.messageText: Objects from Fix XT0497 not allowed to be transferred to the next environment.
reason.messageTextExtended: &N Cause . . . . . :   Some objects of Fix XT0497 of Application XMP have currently a status lower as the ratification level. The objects from environment *ACC can not leave for environment *PRD until all objects have passed the ratification level of environment *ACC after the fix has been ratified by authorized staff. &N Recovery  . . . :   Do as indicated and try your request again.

errorMessages.messageTextExtended: &N Cause . . . . . :   You have specified the invalid action code. &N Recovery  . . . :   Specify the valid action code and try your request again.

prepareTaskLevel.summary: How to specify the prepare request input parameter value at the task level.

prepareResponse200.summary: Response to a successful API call.

errorMessages.messageText: Fix Processing ended ABNORMALLY. One or more objects are not moved or copied.
errorMessages.messageTextExtended: &N Cause . . . . . :   Fix Processing did not end normally. One or more objects are not processed successfully. &N Recovery. . . . :   See the OMS-log and the joblog for more detailed messages, correct the problem and restart Fix Processing.

prepareRequestObjectLevel.summary: How to specify the prepare request input parameter value at the object level.

prepareRequestForCopybook.summary: How to specify the prepare request input parameter value for copybook.

prepareRequestForIFSObject.summary: How to specify the prepare request input parameter value for IFS object.

executeRequestwithJobSchedule.summary: How to specify the execute request input parameter with schedule job and hold job
